attributes.title: dump trump
attributes.review: This app is horrible!! It’s took 7 weeks to download and the updates take months to work. It makes my phone glitch and almost wouldn’t let me delete it. I had nothing else to do with my life while I waited.. If I could give it zero stars I would. 😌🤚

attributes.title: Cheeto dust app✨🟠🍊🧡
attributes.review: THIS app about 🟠 president is horrible, I was trying to think why I should “vote” 🗳 🤣🤣for Cheeto looking face🍊 but it took me out of the app😆✌️✨ surprising right. Well not really. I just don’t recommend it’s horrible. And for all of the supporters talking bout all lives matter and that they support trump, y’all got problems.

attributes.title: This App Is Absolutely Terrible
attributes.review: this app is one of the most terrible apps on the whole appstore . It has no plot , no fun , no ANYTHING . this app is the worst app in the entire world and i hope it gets taken down and trump i absolutely hate you for making such a disgrace of an app . get this disgusting app taken down

attributes.title: Anonymous back again
attributes.review: 🧚🏻‍♀️🥰✨This Cheeto puff must get out the country and back to its Cheeto bag where it belongs. If I see this app once more I am going to lose my marbles. 😡The app was terrible it made me want to cry it was scary. I opened it and saw the scariest looking Cheeto puff. Please get rid of this app. Kids are getting scared and frankly so am I. 🧚🏻‍♀️🥰✨

attributes.title: WORST APP IVE EVER DOWLOADED
attributes.review: don’t not download this terrible app. It takes daysss to download and then when it does it asks for so much personal information and then on top of that so many ads pop up all the time. And on top of that why would you want this app anyways he’s a terrible person . 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Terrible app!!
attributes.review: This app spreads hate and misinformation it doesn’t do any justice for the American people. All trump wants you to see his propaganda. He sells your information to telemarketers and you’ll get calls and texts from them throughout the day. If you don’t want that please don’t download the app!!!

attributes.title: This is horrible 🧚🏼✨
attributes.review:
My dog used to love Donald trump so I got the app for him to use on my phone everything was fine for about 30 seconds then he passed out I took him to the vet and he had died of from being too scared and me and him watched horror movies all the time so I really think it was the app 
DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP KEEP YOUR DOG SAFE🥰

attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE WORLD✨🧚🏾‍♂️💫
attributes.review: Yeah❤️ I 🤰🏾saw this app and thought it was good because I aDiRmE the 🦧👴🏾😏 I clicked on it and it flashed red and white causing me to fall back🙄😻👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩🤰🏾👄🤰🏾I got up as the screen said “bAbY yOu LiGhT mY wOrLd LiKe NoBoDy ElSe” Harry styles came jumping through the screen yelling at me cause I downloaded it👩‍❤️‍👩👄👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩👄😻🧚🏾‍♂️😻 now my baby thinks I like trump NASTY😘👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩✌🏾😻🦧🤰🏾🤰🏾😘😊😍😊😘😊🤰🏾👅🤰🏾

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This is the worst possible app you could ever get I don’t even understand this man has hurt our country so much and the fact that he will put a rally on Black Wall Street on Juneteenth is disgusting and rude but he wants us to respect him I do not respect him and he will never be my president I hate him

attributes.title: Completely terrible!!
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy and the maker needs to be fired!! Trump administration needs to do something about this virus now! I truly believe that banning Tik tok isn’t a need right now. WE NEED CHANGE! Change in our justice system! Change in equality! Change in the office!
